title: Weird Lag??
body:
I at first had this weird ping spike that would go into the thousands, but now, it's this lag that I can only describe as in slow motion, it seems like my walking is significantly slower, and i'll slowly walk up a bit, 'appear' in the place that I should be in after a second or so since it doesn't slow my in game speed, just what I see, I can only describe this lag closer to slow motion than anything, it's weird, everything's moving slower on my screen, so a lot of things just appear, because the games not actually running slower.

I have no packet loss, my internet is fine, and I'm running at a consistent 39 ms, it's lost me a ranked game, I was literally in the middle of a ranked game until I left and tried to rejoin to see if the lag would stop if i did that, and it did for about 30 seconds then start up again, but now the client won't even let me in the game anymore. Anyone else having this issue?

replies.body:
BOYS! i know how to fix this fps issues ( IM SO HAPPY )
it can take 1hour to fix him.
first step: update java to java 121
and finaly in the launcher,
u need to click to the case ( the ''?"" ) and click the scanning files.
And then enjoy.

The symptoms you've described are actually really common symptoms of packet loss to our server. Note that while you may not experience packet loss to one server, you can to another since each server you access resides in a different geolocation. I recommend working through our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to ensure your local network settings aren't conflicting with League.

Let me know if this resolved your issue.
